goal.en: “The contents of this course mainly relates to the wave optics. In this course, the phenomenon of the light wave is studied by the theory of electromagnetic wave. The aims of the course are to let students understand the wave properties, the polarization, the interference and the diffraction of light.“
goal.ch: 授課內容以物理光學為主；以電磁理論為基礎來探討光波的各種現象，讓學生瞭解光的波動特性、偏振特性、干涉現象與繞射現象。

content.en:
1. Wave Motion
2. The Superposition of Waves
3. Polarization
4. Interference
5. Diffraction
6. Fourier Optics
7. Basics of Coherence Theory“
